javadoc:
Interface implemented by classes that provide overview components to the right side 
 of the listing.

methods.javadoc: Returns the component to diplay in the right margin of the listing.
methods.name: getComponent
methods.comment: Returns the component to diplay in the right margin of the listing.

methods.name: setAddressIndexMap
methods.comment:
Sets the AddressIndexMap whenever it changes so that the overview provider has
 an current map.

params.name: map
params.comment: the current AddressIndexMap of the ListingPanel

name: OverviewProvider
comment:
Interface implemented by classes that provide overview components to the right side 
 of the listing.
